query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Noi eravamo al sommo de la scala, 2 dove secondamente si risega 3 lo monte che salendo altrui dismala.
query.result:
**English:**
1 We were at the top of the staircase, 2 where the mountain that disheartens others as they climb 3 rises a second time.
**Malay:**
1 Kami berada di puncak tangga, 2 di mana untuk kedua kalinya menjulang 3 gunung yang membuat orang lain putus asa saat mendakinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Ivi così una cornice lega 5 dintorno il poggio, come la primaia; 6 se non che l’arco suo più tosto piega.
query.result:
**English:**
4 There a ledge encircles the hill, 5 just like the first one, 6 except that its arc curves more quickly.
**Malay:**
4 Di sana sebuah birai mengelilingi bukit, 5 seperti yang pertama; 6 kecuali lengkungannya lebih cepat membelok.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Ombra non lì è né segno che si paia: 8 parsi la ripa e parsi la via schietta 9 col livido color de la petraia.
query.result:
**English:**
7 There is no shadow there, nor any sign that pairs with it: 8 the bank and the straight path appear 9 with the livid color of the rock.
**Malay:**
7 Bayangan tidak ada di sana, juga tidak ada tanda yang menyertainya: 8 tepi sungai dan jalan yang lurus tampak 9 dengan warna batu yang pucat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 «Se qui per dimandar gente s’aspetta», 11 ragionava il poeta, «io temo forse 12 che troppo avrà d’indugio nostra eletta».
query.result:
**English:**
10 "If people are expected here to ask questions," 11 the poet reasoned, "I fear perhaps 12 that our choice will have too much delay."
**Malay:**
10 "Jika di sini orang-orang diharapkan untuk bertanya," 11 sang penyair bernalar, "aku khawatir mungkin 12 bahwa pilihan kita akan terlalu banyak penundaan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Poi fisamente al sole li occhi porse; 14 fece del destro lato a muover centro, 15 e la sinistra parte di sé torse.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Then he fixed his eyes intently on the sun; 14 he made the right side his center of movement, 15 and turned the left part of himself.
**Malay:**
13 Kemudian dia menatap matahari dengan saksama; 14 dia menjadikan sisi kanan sebagai pusat pergerakannya, 15 dan memutar bagian kirinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 «O dolce lume a cui fidanza i’ entro 17 per lo novo cammin, tu ne conduci», 18 dicea, «come condur si vuol quinc’ entro.
query.result:
**English:**
16 "O sweet light in whom I trust 17 for the new path, you lead us," 18 he said, "as one should be led here.
**Malay:**
16 "Wahai cahaya yang manis yang kepadanya aku percaya 17 untuk jalan yang baru, kamu menuntun kami," 18 katanya, "sebagaimana seharusnya seseorang dituntun di sini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Tu scaldi il mondo, tu sovr’ esso luci; 20 s’altra ragione in contrario non ponta, 21 esser dien sempre li tuoi raggi duci».
query.result:
**English:**
19 You warm the world, you shine upon it; 20 if no other reason contradicts, 21 your rays must always be leaders.
**Malay:**
19 Engkau menghangatkan dunia, engkau bersinar di atasnya; 20 jika tidak ada alasan lain yang bertentangan, 21 sinarmu harus selalu menjadi pemimpin.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 La prima voce che passò volando 29 ‘Vinum non habent’ altamente disse, 30 e dietro a noi l’andò reïterando.
query.result:
**English:**
28 The first voice that passed by flying 29 said loudly, ‘They have no wine’, 30 and behind us it went repeating it.
**Malay:**
28 Suara pertama yang lewat terbang 29 berkata dengan lantang, ‘Mereka tidak punya anggur’, 30 dan di belakang kami ia terus mengulanginya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 E prima che del tutto non si udisse 32 per allungarsi, un’altra ‘I’ sono Oreste’ 33 passò gridando, e anco non s’affisse.
query.result:
**English:**
31 And before he had completely disappeared, 32 to make himself heard, another shouted, ‘I am Orestes,’ 33 and he too did not stop.
**Malay:**
31 Dan sebelum dia benar-benar menghilang, 32 untuk membuat dirinya didengar, yang lain berteriak, ‘Aku Orestes,’ 33 dan dia juga tidak berhenti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 «Oh!», diss’ io, «padre, che voci son queste?». 35 E com’ io domandai, ecco la terza 36 dicendo: ‘Amate da cui male aveste’.
query.result:
**English:**
34 "Oh!" I said, "father, what are these voices?" 35 And as I asked, behold the third 36 saying: 'Loved by those whom you wronged'.
**Malay:**
34 "Oh!" kataku, "ayah, suara-suara apakah ini?" 35 Dan ketika aku bertanya, lihatlah yang ketiga 36 berkata: 'Dicintai oleh mereka yang telah kamu sakiti'.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 E ’l buon maestro: «Questo cinghio sferza 38 la colpa de la invidia, e però sono 39 tratte d’amor le corde de la ferza.
query.result:
**English:**
37 And the good master: "This lash whips 38 the sin of envy, and therefore 39 the cords of the whip are drawn from love.
**Malay:**
37 Dan guru yang baik: "Cambuk ini menyesah 38 dosa kedengkian, dan karena itu 39 tali-tali cambuk itu ditarik dari cinta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Lo fren vuol esser del contrario suono; 41 credo che l’udirai, per mio avviso, 42 prima che giunghi al passo del perdono.
query.result:
**English:**
40 The rein wants to be of the opposite sound; 41 I believe that you will hear it, in my opinion, 42 before you reach the pass of forgiveness.
**Malay:**
40 Kekang itu ingin menjadi suara yang berlawanan; 41 aku percaya bahwa kamu akan mendengarnya, menurut pendapatku, 42 sebelum kamu sampai di tempat pengampunan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Ma ficca li occhi per l’aere ben fiso, 44 e vedrai gente innanzi a noi sedersi, 45 e ciascun è lungo la grotta assiso».
query.result:
**English:**
43 But fix your eyes intently through the air, 44 and you will see people sitting in front of us, 45 and each one is seated along the cave.
**Malay:**
43 Tetapi tataplah matamu dengan saksama ke udara, 44 dan kamu akan melihat orang-orang duduk di hadapan kita, 45 dan masing-masing duduk di sepanjang gua.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Allora più che prima li occhi apersi; 47 guarda’mi innanzi, e vidi ombre con manti 48 al color de la pietra non diversi.
query.result:
**English:**
46 Then more than before I opened my eyes; 47 I looked ahead, and I saw shades with cloaks 48 no different in color from the stone.
**Malay:**
46 Kemudian lebih dari sebelumnya aku membuka mataku; 47 melihat ke depanku, dan aku melihat bayangan-bayangan dengan jubah 48 yang warnanya tidak berbeda dengan batu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 E poi che fummo un poco più avanti, 50 udia gridar: ‘Maria, òra per noi’: 51 gridar ‘Michele’ e ‘Pietro’ e ‘Tutti santi’.
query.result:
**English:**
49 And after we had gone a little further, 50 I heard a voice cry out: ‘Mary, pray for us now’: 51 crying out ‘Michael’ and ‘Peter’ and ‘All Saints’.
**Malay:**
49 Dan setelah kami berjalan sedikit lebih jauh, 50 kudengar suara berseru: ‘Maria, berdoalah untuk kami sekarang’: 51 berseru ‘Michael’ dan ‘Peter’ dan ‘Semua Orang Suci’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Di vil ciliccio mi parean coperti, 59 e l’un sofferia l’altro con la spalla, 60 e tutti da la ripa eran sofferti.
query.result:
**English:**
58 In vile haircloth I think they were covered, 59 and one suffered the other with his shoulder, 60 and all were suffered by the bank.
**Malay:**
58 Dengan kain kasar yang buruk menurutku mereka ditutupi, 59 dan yang satu menderita yang lain dengan bahunya, 60 dan semua menderita di tepi sungai.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Così li ciechi a cui la roba falla, 62 stanno a’ perdoni a chieder lor bisogna, 63 e l’uno il capo sopra l’altro avvalla,
64 perché ’n altrui pietà tosto si pogna, 65 non pur per lo sonar de le parole, 66 ma per la vista che non meno agogna.
query.result:
**English:**
61 Thus the blind, to whom begging brings in their livelihood, 62 stand at pardons to ask for their need, 63 and one bows his head upon the other's,
64 so that pity may quickly be aroused in others, 65 not only by the sound of the words, 66 but by the sight which no less appeals.
**Malay:**
61 Begitulah orang-orang buta yang hidupnya bergantung pada belas kasihan, 62 berdiri di tempat-tempat pengampunan untuk meminta kebutuhan mereka, 63 dan yang satu menundukkan kepalanya di atas kepala yang lain,
64 agar belas kasihan segera muncul pada orang lain, 65 bukan hanya karena suara kata-kata, 66 tetapi juga karena pemandangan yang tidak kalah menarik.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 A me pareva, andando, fare oltraggio, 74 veggendo altrui, non essendo veduto: 75 per ch’io mi volsi al mio consiglio saggio.
query.result:
**English:**
73 To me it seemed, as I went on, to be an outrage, 74 seeing others, not being seen: 75 therefore I turned to my wise counsel.
**Malay:**
73 Bagiku tampak, ketika aku berjalan, melakukan penghinaan, 74 melihat orang lain, tidak terlihat: 75 oleh karena itu aku berpaling kepada nasihatku yang bijaksana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Ben sapev’ ei che volea dir lo muto; 77 e però non attese mia dimanda, 78 ma disse: «Parla, e sie breve e arguto».
query.result:
**English:**
76 He knew very well what the mute one wanted to say; 77 and therefore he did not wait for my question, 78 but said: "Speak, and be brief and to the point."
**Malay:**
76 Dia tahu betul apa yang ingin dikatakan oleh si bisu; 77 dan oleh karena itu dia tidak menunggu pertanyaanku, 78 tetapi berkata: "Bicaralah, dan singkat serta jelas."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Volsimi a loro e: «O gente sicura», 86 incominciai, «di veder l’alto lume 87 che ’l disio vostro solo ha in sua cura,
88 se tosto grazia resolva le schiume 89 di vostra coscïenza sì che chiaro 90 per essa scenda de la mente il fiume,
91 ditemi, ché mi fia grazioso e caro, 92 s’anima è qui tra voi che sia latina; 93 e forse lei sarà buon s’i’ l’apparo».
query.result:
**English:**
85 I turned to them and said: "O people secure 86 in seeing the high light 87 that your desire alone holds in its care,
88 if grace soon resolves the foam 89 of your conscience so that clearly 90 through it the river of the mind descends,
91 tell me, for it will be gracious and dear to me, 92 if there is a soul here among you that is Latin; 93 and perhaps it will be good for me if I learn of it."
**Malay:**
85 Aku berpaling kepada mereka dan berkata: "Wahai orang-orang yang aman 86 dalam melihat cahaya yang tinggi 87 yang hanya keinginan kalian yang ada dalam perhatiannya,
88 jika rahmat segera menyelesaikan buih 89 dari kesadaran kalian sehingga dengan jelas 90 melaluinya sungai pikiran mengalir,
91 katakan padaku, karena itu akan menyenangkan dan berarti bagiku, 92 jika ada jiwa di sini di antara kalian yang berbahasa Latin; 93 dan mungkin itu akan baik untukku jika aku mempelajarinya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 «O frate mio, ciascuna è cittadina 95 d’una vera città; ma tu vuo’ dire 96 che vivesse in Italia peregrina».
query.result:
**English:**
94 "O my brother, each one is a citizen 95 of a true city; but you want to say 96 that she lived in Italy as a pilgrim."
**Malay:**
94 "Wahai saudaraku, masing-masing adalah warga 95 dari sebuah kota yang sejati; tetapi kamu ingin mengatakan 96 bahwa dia hidup di Italia sebagai seorang peziarah."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Questo mi parve per risposta udire 98 più innanzi alquanto che là dov’ io stava, 99 ond’ io mi feci ancor più là sentire.
query.result:
**English:**
97 This seemed to me to hear in answer 98 a little further on from where I stood, 99 so that I made myself heard even further.
**Malay:**
97 Ini tampak bagiku sebagai jawaban 98 sedikit lebih jauh dari tempat aku berdiri, 99 sehingga aku membuat diriku terdengar lebih jauh lagi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Tra l’altre vidi un’ombra ch’aspettava 101 in vista; e se volesse alcun dir ‘Come?’, 102 lo mento a guisa d’orbo in sù levava.
query.result:
**English:**
100 Among the others I saw a shade who was waiting 101 in sight; and if anyone wanted to say, “How?”, 102 he raised his chin upward like a blind man.
**Malay:**
100 Di antara yang lain kulihat bayangan yang sedang menunggu 101 di kejauhan; dan jika ada yang ingin berkata, “Bagaimana?”, 102 ia mengangkat dagunya ke atas seperti orang buta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 «Spirto», diss’ io, «che per salir ti dome, 104 se tu se’ quelli che mi rispondesti, 105 fammiti conto o per luogo o per nome».
query.result:
**English:**
103 "Spirit," I said, "who are struggling to climb out, 104 if you are the one who answered me, 105 tell me about yourself, either by place or by name."
**Malay:**
103 "Roh," kataku, "yang sedang berjuang untuk keluar, 104 jika kamu adalah orang yang menjawabku, 105 ceritakan tentang dirimu, baik berdasarkan tempat atau nama."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 «Io fui sanese», rispuose, «e con questi 107 altri rimendo qui la vita ria, 108 lagrimando a colui che sé ne presti.
query.result:
**English:**
106 "I was from Siena," he replied, "and with these 107 others I waste my wretched life here, 108 weeping to him who lends it to us.
**Malay:**
106 "Aku dari Siena," jawabnya, "dan dengan yang lain ini 107 aku menghabiskan hidupku yang malang di sini, 108 menangis kepada dia yang meminjamkannya kepada kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Savia non fui, avvegna che Sapìa 110 fossi chiamata, e fui de li altrui danni 111 più lieta assai che di ventura mia.
query.result:
**English:**
109 I was not wise, although I was called Sapìa, 110 and I was more joyful of others' misfortunes 111 than of my own good fortune.
**Malay:**
109 Aku tidak bijaksana, meskipun aku dipanggil Sapìa, 110 dan aku lebih gembira dengan kemalangan orang lain 111 daripada keberuntunganku sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 E perché tu non creda ch’io t’inganni, 113 odi s’i’ fui, com’ io ti dico, folle, 114 già discendendo l’arco d’i miei anni.
query.result:
**English:**
112 And so that you do not believe that I deceive you, 113 hear if I was, as I tell you, foolish, 114 already descending the arch of my years.
**Malay:**
112 Dan agar kamu tidak percaya bahwa aku menipumu, 113 dengarlah jika aku, seperti yang kukatakan kepadamu, bodoh, 114 sudah menuruni lengkungan tahun-tahunku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Eran li cittadin miei presso a Colle 116 in campo giunti co’ loro avversari, 117 e io pregava Iddio di quel ch’e’ volle.
query.result:
**English:**
115 My fellow citizens were near Colle, 116 having arrived on the field with their adversaries, 117 and I prayed to God for what He willed.
**Malay:**
115 Warga negaraku berada di dekat Colle, 116 telah tiba di medan perang bersama musuh-musuh mereka, 117 dan aku berdoa kepada Tuhan untuk apa yang dikehendaki-Nya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Rotti fuor quivi e vòlti ne li amari 119 passi di fuga; e veggendo la caccia, 120 letizia presi a tutte altre dispari,
121 tanto ch’io volsi in sù l’ardita faccia, 122 gridando a Dio: “Omai più non ti temo!”, 123 come fé ’l merlo per poca bonaccia.
query.result:
**English:**
118 Bread was taken out there and turned into hampers 119 of flight; and seeing the hunt, 120 I took joy unlike any other,
121 so much so that I turned my bold face upward, 122 crying out to God: “Now I fear you no more!”, 123 as the blackbird did in a brief lull.
**Malay:**
118 Roti dikeluarkan di sana dan dimasukkan ke dalam keranjang 119 langkah pelarian; dan melihat perburuan itu, 120 aku merasakan kegembiraan yang tak tertandingi,
121 sehingga aku menengadahkan wajahku yang berani, 122 berseru kepada Tuhan: "Sekarang aku tidak takut padamu lagi!", 123 seperti yang dilakukan burung hitam dalam jeda singkat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Pace volli con Dio in su lo stremo 125 de la mia vita; e ancor non sarebbe 126 lo mio dover per penitenza scemo,
127 se ciò non fosse, ch’a memoria m’ebbe 128 Pier Pettinaio in sue sante orazioni, 129 a cui di me per caritate increbbe.
query.result:
**English:**
124 I made peace with God at the end 125 of my life; and my duty would not yet be 126 diminished by penance,
127 if it were not that Pier Pettinaio remembered me 128 in his holy prayers, 129 who took pity on me out of charity.
**Malay:**
124 Aku berdamai dengan Tuhan pada akhir 125 hidupku; dan tugasku belum akan 126 berkurang dengan penebusan dosa,
127 jika bukan karena Pier Pettinaio mengingatku 128 dalam doa-doa sucinya, 129 yang mengasihaniku karena belas kasih.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Ma tu chi se’, che nostre condizioni 131 vai dimandando, e porti li occhi sciolti, 132 sì com’ io credo, e spirando ragioni?».
query.result:
**English:**
130 But who are you, who go asking about our conditions, 131 and wear your eyes unbound, 132 as I believe, and speak while breathing?”.
**Malay:**
130 Tetapi siapakah engkau, yang menanyakan keadaan kami, 131 dan memakai matamu yang tidak terikat, 132 seperti yang kupercaya, dan berbicara sambil bernapas?”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 «Li occhi», diss’ io, «mi fieno ancor qui tolti, 134 ma picciol tempo, ché poca è l’offesa 135 fatta per esser con invidia vòlti.
query.result:
**English:**
133 "My eyes," I said, "will still be taken from me here, 134 but only for a short time, because the offense 135 committed by turning them with envy is small.
**Malay:**
133 "Mataku," kataku, "akan tetap diambil dariku di sini, 134 tetapi hanya untuk waktu yang singkat, karena pelanggaran 135 yang dilakukan dengan memalingkannya dengan rasa iri itu kecil.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 Troppa è più la paura ond’ è sospesa 137 l’anima mia del tormento di sotto, 138 che già lo ’ncarco di là giù mi pesa».
query.result:
**English:**
136 Too great is the fear with which my soul is suspended 137 from the torment below, 138 that already the burden of it weighs on me from down there.
**Malay:**
136 Terlalu besar rasa takut yang membuat jiwaku terkatung-katung 137 dari siksaan di bawah, 138 yang bebannya dari bawah sana sudah membebaniku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Ed ella a me: «Chi t’ha dunque condotto 140 qua sù tra noi, se giù ritornar credi?». 141 E io: «Costui ch’è meco e non fa motto.
query.result:
**English:**
139 And she to me: "Who has led you here 140 up here among us, if you believe you will return below?". 141 And I: "This one who is with me and does not speak.
**Malay:**
139 Dan dia kepadaku: "Siapa yang telah membawamu 140 ke sini di antara kami, jika kamu percaya kamu akan kembali ke bawah?". 141 Dan aku: "Orang ini yang bersamaku dan tidak berbicara.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 E vivo sono; e però mi richiedi, 143 spirito eletto, se tu vuo’ ch’i’ mova 144 di là per te ancor li mortai piedi».
query.result:
**English:**
142 And I am alive; and therefore you ask me, 143 chosen spirit, if you want me to move 144 my mortal feet for you even beyond there."
**Malay:**
142 Dan aku masih hidup; dan oleh karena itu kamu memintaku, 143 roh yang terpilih, jika kamu ingin aku bergerak 144 kakiku yang fana untukmu bahkan di sana."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
145 «Oh, questa è a udir sì cosa nuova», 146 rispuose, «che gran segno è che Dio t’ami; 147 però col priego tuo talor mi giova.
query.result:
**English:**
145 "Oh, this is indeed a new thing to hear," 146 he replied, "that is a great sign that God loves you; 147 therefore, with your prayer, you sometimes give me joy.
**Malay:**
145 "Oh, ini memang hal yang baru untuk didengar," 146 jawabnya, "itu pertanda besar bahwa Tuhan mencintaimu; 147 oleh karena itu, dengan doamu, terkadang kamu membuatku senang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
148 E cheggioti, per quel che tu più brami, 149 se mai calchi la terra di Toscana, 150 che a’ miei propinqui tu ben mi rinfami.
query.result:
**English:**
148 And I ask you, by what you most desire, 149 if ever you tread the land of Tuscany, 150 that you kindly commend me to my kindred.
**Malay:**
148 Dan aku memintamu, demi apa yang paling kamu inginkan, 149 jika suatu saat kamu menginjak tanah Toscana, 150 agar kamu menyampaikan salamku kepada sanak saudaraku.
